hero.headline: Know Your Heart.
hero.heartline: And let it rest on the ground.
hero.subhead:
Every moment you choose to be here
adds to our shared world state ‚Äî
a quiet measure of presence,
built together,
minute by minute.

worldState.copy: Every time someone chooses presence, it flows into the world state. The more we practice, the stronger the shared frequency becomes.
bullets: Sharing presence: sharing your true self helps others find their way
worldState.error: Unable to load world state. Please try again later.
worldState.TARGET_OVERFLOW: Amazing! We exceeded our goal by {overflow}%
worldState.WORLD_STATE_GETTING_STARTED_DESCRIPTION: Begin your meditation journey with the community
worldState.WORLD_STATE_BUILDING_COMMUNITY_DESCRIPTI: Growing together, one breath at a time

worldStateExplainer.title: A shared counter that grows
worldStateExplainer.description: Every time someone chooses presence, their minutes are added to a shared counter. It's a quiet signal‚Äîa reminder that we're choosing presence, together.

foundation.title: Why Inigo exists
foundation.body:
The world today rarely lets the heart rest on the ground.

We are either pulled upward ‚Äî
into noise, speed, and constant emotion ‚Äî

or pushed downward ‚Äî
into exhaustion and numbness.

Both keep us moving.
Both keep us disconnected.

Inigo creates a different place.

Not above.
Not below.

But on the ground ‚Äî
where presence carries love
without fear.

whatIsInigo.title: What Inigo is
whatIsInigo.body:
Inigo is a place to put down time.

Not to escape life,
but to meet it fully ‚Äî
as it is.

You choose a moment.
You stay with it.
You let time soften.

What you're doing doesn't matter.

Sitting quietly.
Walking without destination.
Reading.
Working with attention.
Moving your body.
Touching the earth.
Caring for another.

If you are here ‚Äî
it counts.

wonder.title: What the heart needs
wonder.text:
Sometimes the heart doesn't need answers.

It needs a place to land.

A moment where time loosens,
and something real can be felt again.

presenceInAction.title: Presence in action
presenceInAction.text:
Presence doesn't belong to one action.

Sitting with silence is one way.

But so is walking.
Reading a book.
Working in the garden.
Eating.
Cooking.

Any moment where you are truly here ‚Äî
can hold the heart on the ground.

images.alt: person sitting quietly by a window
person reading a book by a window
person eating a simple meal slowly
person cooking with presence and attention

discoverReflect.copy: A place doesn't need to be far or special. It can be your home, a corner of the garden, a view of the sky, or a spot where your heart naturally opens.

cards.title: Your place, your way
cards.description: A room, a balcony, a bench, or a familiar view.

cards.title: Return, don't escape
cards.description: Come back to the same place again and again ‚Äî let it hold you.

cards.title: Gentle reflections
cards.description: Words, images, or silence ‚Äî whatever feels safe to share.

spots.title: Home
spots.description: A quiet corner where your body can soften.

spots.title: Near the sky
spots.description: A place to watch clouds, birds, or light changing.

spots.title: The familiar path
spots.description: A spot you pass every day ‚Äî now seen with presence.

discoverReflect.ctaNote: You can change it anytime. There is no "right" place.

community.copy: No noisy feeds, no endless scrolling. Just presence, shared in a calm and safe space.

bullets: Help shape a calm, human space online
Early access to new presence modes (quiet, walking, movement)
Be part of a quieter direction for technology

items.a: Yes. Your sessions aggregate into the world state; sharing is optional.

footer.tagline: Inigo ‚Äî Know Your Heart. ¬∑ Quiet is the new power

about.opening:
Hi.

We are Inigo.

We didn't come with answers.

We came to stay for a moment.

body.text:
We didn't start with an idea.

We started with a feeling.

A sense that something in the way we live

was slowly pulling us away from ourselves.

Not dramatically.

Not all at once.

Just enough to notice

that it was getting harder to stay.

Harder to stay with a moment.

Harder to stay with another person.

Harder to stay with what we were actually feeling

without immediately needing to fix it, explain it, or move on.

So we began paying attention.

Life kept lifting us off the ground.

Into noise.

Into speed.

Into constant reaction.

And when that became too much,

it pushed us the other way ‚Äî

into tiredness,

into shutting down,

into doing only what was necessary to get through the day.

We were either floating,

or buried.

What we almost never felt

was this simple thing:

being on the ground,

with the heart still open.

Because when the heart isn't on the ground,

it gets tricked.

It starts to believe

that control is safety,

that speed is aliveness,

that numbness is rest.

And we could feel, in our own lives,

how easy it is to lose touch with something real

without even realizing it's happening.

Not because we're weak.

But because the world doesn't leave much room

for staying.

We didn't want another practice.

We didn't want something to optimize us,

improve us,

or turn presence into a performance.

We wanted a place

where time could slow down
without collapsing.

A place where you could sit in silence ‚Äî
or walk,
or read,
or eat,
or work with your hands,
or do your job,
or be with another heart ‚Äî

and feel that it all counts.

That moving forward
and staying balanced
don't have to be opposites.

Inigo is a place to put down time.

Not to escape life,

but to meet it ‚Äî

as it is.

Some moments are quiet.

Some are moving.

Some are ordinary.

What matters is not what you're doing,

but whether you're really there.

If you are ‚Äî

that time matters.

Because staying is easier

when you're not the only one staying.

Not through pressure.

Not through comparison.

Just through the quiet knowledge

that others are also choosing

not to rush away.

Inigo isn't a feed to perform in.

It's a shared space that says:

"You're allowed to slow down here."

We've come to believe something simple and firm:

A heart grounded in love

cannot be controlled.

That belief shapes every decision we make ‚Äî

what we build,

what we leave out,

and how we grow.

If any of this feels familiar,

you're welcome here.

Not to become someone else.

Just to stay a little longer

with what's already true.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions? Want to collaborate? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.responseTime: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.socialDescription: Follow us for updates and community
contact.responseTimeDescription: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please include "URGENT" in your subject line.

cta.title: Ready to slow down?
cta.subtitle: While you're here, why not sign up for early access?

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us. Here's how we protect your data.

intro.title: Privacy Policy
intro.text: Your privacy matters to us. This policy explains how Inigo, developed and operated by Asaf Gadassi, collects, uses, and protects your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.text: We collect only what's necessary to provide a meaningful presence experience:
items: Email address ‚Äì for secure account creation and login (via Google or Apple Sign-In)
Device information ‚Äì such as model and operating system, to ensure proper performance
Presence sessions ‚Äì duration and time, used to contribute anonymously to our collective world state
Optional reflections and photos ‚Äì only if you choose to share them within the community
dataCollection.note: We do not collect sensitive personal information such as location history beyond what is required to show nearby presence spots (if permission is granted).

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
items: Create and maintain your account securely
Provide personalized and reliable presence experiences
Update collective world-state metrics (anonymously)
Improve Inigo based on community feedback
Send essential updates about features or account information
dataUsage.note: We do not use your data for advertising or sell it to third parties.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: Inigo uses trusted services to operate safely and efficiently:
items: Firebase (Authentication, Storage, Analytics) ‚Äì to handle login, store photos, and measure performance
Django Backend ‚Äì to manage user profiles and presence data securely on our private server
thirdParty.note: These services follow industry-standard security practices and comply with GDPR and other applicable privacy regulations.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
items: All communication is encrypted in transit (HTTPS) and at rest
Access to data is strictly limited to necessary operations
Shared experiences are visible only according to your sharing choices
Presence statistics are aggregated anonymously

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You have full control over your information:
items: Access your personal data
Update or correct inaccurate details
Delete your account and all related data
Opt out of emails or communications
Export your data in a portable format upon request
rights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: We keep your information only as long as needed to provide the service or as required by law. If you delete your account, all personal data will be removed within a reasonable timeframe.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.text: Inigo is intended for users aged 16 and older. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 16. If you believe a child has used the app, please contact us for prompt deletion of their data.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.text: This Privacy Policy may be updated as Inigo evolves. When changes occur, we'll update the "Last Updated" date and, where appropriate, notify users in-app. Your continued use of Inigo means you accept the revised policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have any questions about your privacy or data, please reach out:

cta.title: Ready to join with confidence?
cta.subtitle: Your privacy is protected, your data is secure.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please review these terms to understand how to use Inigo respectfully and safely.
terms.intro: Welcome to Inigo, a social presence network and mobile application developed and operated by Asaf Gadassi ("Inigo", "we", "us", or "our"). These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the Inigo mobile app (the "App") and the Inigo website available at https://inigo.now (the "Site"). By using Inigo, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree, please do not use the App or Site.

aboutInigo.title: 1. About Inigo
aboutInigo.text1: Inigo is an early-stage personal project created by Asaf Gadassi as a proof of concept for a social presence network. Its purpose is to help people connect through quiet presence, mindfulness, and shared experiences of being present.
items: Choose and return to places that hold you
Track personal presence time
Contribute to a collective world presence counter
Share reflections, photos, and moments of presence with others
aboutInigo.text3: Inigo is currently running in a small testing volume, and features may evolve or change without notice.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
items: Be at least 16 years old
Have the legal capacity to agree to these Terms
Use the App and Site in a respectful, lawful, and good-faith manner

accounts.title: 3. Accounts and Authentication
accounts.text1: You may create an account or sign in using Google or Apple authentication. By doing so, you agree to:
items: Provide accurate and up-to-date information
Keep your login credentials secure
Accept responsibility for all actions taken under your account
accounts.text2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms or harm the community.

userContent.title: 4. User Content
userContent.text1: You may post reflections, photos, and experiences ("User Content"). By sharing such content, you grant Asaf Gadassi a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, display, and distribute that content within Inigo to operate and improve the service.
userContent.text2: You are responsible for your User Content and agree that it will not:
items: Violate any law or third-party rights
Contain harmful, explicit, hateful, or misleading material
Infringe on others' privacy
userContent.text3: We may remove or restrict any content that violates these Terms or community values.

communityGuidelines.title: 5. Community Guidelines
communityGuidelines.text1: Inigo exists to cultivate quiet, kindness, and authentic connection. By participating, you agree to:
items: Share only in a mindful and respectful way
Avoid harassment, hate speech, or self-promotion
Honor silence and simplicity ‚Äî sometimes saying nothing is enough
communityGuidelines.text2: Users who act in ways that disrupt this environment may be suspended or removed.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.text: All materials, designs, code, and content related to Inigo are created and owned by Asaf Gadassi. You may not copy, modify, or redistribute any part of Inigo without written permission.

privacy.title: 7. Privacy
privacy.text: Your privacy is important. Inigo uses secure third-party tools such as Firebase (for authentication and storage) and Django (for backend operations). No data is sold or shared with external parties. Please review our Privacy Policy for details on how information is collected, stored, and used.

experimental.title: 8. Experimental Nature
experimental.text: Inigo is an evolving prototype. You acknowledge that:
items: Features may be incomplete or temporarily unavailable
Data or accounts may be reset during testing
The experience may change as development continues

disclaimer.title: 9. Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: Inigo is not a medical, therapeutic, or diagnostic service. It is a community space for personal reflection and shared presence. Use the App and Site at your own discretion and consult a professional for medical or psychological concerns.

limitation.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitation.text: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Asaf Gadassi shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use or inability to use Inigo.

termination.title: 11. Termination
termination.text: You may stop using Inigo at any time. We may suspend or delete accounts that violate these Terms, disrupt others' experiences, or threaten the integrity of the platform.

changes.title: 12. Changes to Terms
changes.text: These Terms may be updated as Inigo grows. When changes are made, the updated version will be published at https://inigo.now/terms. Your continued use of Inigo after changes take effect means you accept the revised Terms.

contact.title: 13. Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions, feedback, or concerns, please contact:
items: Email: inigomeditation@gmail.com
Website: https://inigo.now

governingLaw.title: 14. Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Israel, without regard to conflict of law principles.
